text: Culebra (meaning snake in Spanish) has several meanings: * Island of Culebra, part of Puerto Rico. * Culebra Peak, the southernmost fourteener in Colorado, USA. * Culebra (automobile), an English automobile manufactured in 1989. * The Culebra Cut, an artificial valley located in the Panama Canal area, was renamed the Gaillard Cut in 1915.
title: Culebra
